info.name: Brief RSS reader Wooden Skin
info.description:
Wooden skin for Brief 1.6b1 with natural colors.

Pictures and embedded videos centered. Green\White unread\read title.
info.additionalInfo:
2014.12.04 -> Brief 2.0
2011.10.26 -> Changed few colors
2011.10.20 -> Minor bugs, bookmarks star, title
2011.10.12 -> Half skin, only content area.
